      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(LineReaderListener subscriber)
        the subscriber's passedLine method will be called when a line has been crossed. allowing it to perform what ever it need without having to constantly check status of the isPassedLine(). subscriber should be instantiated and running.
        Parameters:
        subscriber -
